content: But it's getting a little tired and old because it seems that even though you indicated you've reached a sweet spot regarding the cost of SPD film and we have Gauzy, but it seems quarter after quarter, the fee income really is pathetic and given the fact that SPD is the best flight control technology on the market, and that the course has been down to the extent that as the sweet spot, using your words, I still can't understand why there aren't architectural firms, other car manufacturers.
